name: Aether Man
description:
AETHER MAN

You play as Aether Man, on a quest to defeat the other elements. Distort the Aether and defeat your enemies with your mystical powers...

After about 3 hours of work from 3 people, this is our entry into Trijam #184 ;)

Controls:

Left click: Push the Aether

Right click: Pull the Aether

WASD: Movement

Enemy tips:

Defeat Earth Man by using his projectiles against him...

Defeat Wind Man by sucking his life force...

Use the surrounding water to defeat Fire Man...

Water Man will evaporate over time, you must simply survive...

CREDITS:

Art - Hannah C

Programming - Nav n Zak
